When harnessed correctly, it can turn passive supporters into zealous advocates and critics into dismissive outsiders.

- **Influencer Networks**: Cultivate a network of influencers and thought leaders who exclusively speak to your base’s values and fears, using familiar language and symbols to deepen trust and loyalty.
